scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,server,ai -c auto "yarn workspace frontend dev" "yarn workspace server dev" "yarn workspace ai dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n frontend,server,ai -c auto "yarn workspace frontend start" "yarn workspace server start" "yarn workspace ai start"
scripts.build: concurrently -n frontend,server,ai -c auto "yarn workspace frontend build" "yarn workspace server build" "yarn workspace ai build"
scripts.build:win: cross-env-shell BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/windows yarn workspace server build && yarn workspace server pkg:win && yarn workspace frontend build:win && yarn workspace ai pkg:win && electron-builder --config electron-builder.win.yml --win && node scripts/windows.js
scripts.build:mac: cross-env-shell BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/mac yarn workspace server build && yarn workspace server pkg:mac && yarn workspace frontend build:mac && yarn workspace ai pkg:mac && electron-builder --config electron-builder.mac.yml --mac && node scripts/mac.js
scripts.build:linux: cross-env-shell BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/linux yarn workspace server build && yarn workspace server pkg:linux && yarn workspace frontend build:linux && yarn workspace ai pkg:linux && electron-builder --config electron-builder.linux.yml --linux && node scripts/linux.js
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace frontend typecheck && yarn workspace server typecheck && yarn workspace ai typecheck
scripts.format: yarn workspace frontend format && yarn workspace server format && yarn workspace ai format
scripts.lint: yarn workspace frontend lint && yarn workspace server lint && yarn workspace ai lint
